message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value is significantly higher than your offer. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $16,000. Can you meet me at $16,000?
